headline.main: SPIRITUAL TRUCE URGED ON WORLD; Hatred in Any Form Must Be Conquered, Rabbi H.S. Goldstein Declares

lead_paragraph: A spiritual armistice is needed by the world, Rabbi Herbert S. Goldstein declared in West Side Institutional Synagogue, 120 West Seventy-sixth Street, yesterday.
snippet: A spiritual armistice is needed by the world, Rabbi Herbert S. Goldstein declared in West Side Institutional Synagogue, 120 West Seventy-sixth Street, yesterday....
